footer.subscribeText: Join our mailing list to be the first to know about the latest products and exclusive discounts. Don't miss out on special offers tailored just for you!

productDetails.mostPopularDesc: This product is the most picked by our customers, offering the perfect balance of features and value. Get the best-loved version from our selection, chosen for its quality and performance.
productDetails.lowestPriceDesc: Choose this option for the most affordable price in our inventory. It's the best deal if you're looking to save while still enjoying great features and reliability.
productDetails.rebornTxt: Refurbished products are not the same as used or second-hand items. Our partner sellers adhere to strict quality standards to ensure every product functions like new. The refurbishment process involves thorough cleaning, testing, and evaluation of each item. We ensure that every product is 100% functional before it goes out for delivery. You get what it says on the box, or your money back
productDetails.oneYearWarrantyTxt: If your item has a technical defect within the first year, we'll repair or replace it.
productDetails.changeYourMindTxt: Return your item for any reason within 14 days of receiving it. Simple as that!
productDetails.technicalConditionsTxt: Your device is 100% functional regardless of its condition
